text: A Home for Tanya () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Kulidzhanov.Отчий дом«Мама больше не выйдет замуж». Жизнь и судьба Люсьены Овчинниковой It stars Vera Kuznetsova, Lyudmila Marchenko, and Valentin Zubkov. ==Actors== * Vera Kuznetsova as Natalya Avdeyevna * Lyudmila Marchenko as Tanya * Valentin Zubkov as Sergei Ivanovich * Nikolai Novlyansky as Grandfather Avdey (as N. Novlyansky) * Nonna Mordyukova as Stepanida * Lyusyena Ovchinnikova as Nyurka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kulidzhanov
title: A Home for Tanya
